channel.title: dapr on Statics Must Die! - Writings by Corstijan Kortsmit
channel.description: Recent content in dapr on Statics Must Die! - Writings by Corstijan Kortsmit

item.title: Getting brave with Dapr
item.description: A standardized library available to help developers in things like look-ups, persistence, security or messaging, has been a goal for platform creators since before even J2EE was first released. Today, we look at the latest incarnation of this goal. It’s called DAPR, and it’s made by Microsoft. Let’s go! Oh no, he didn’t Did he compare the latest hippest, fanciest, shiny technology to hit the market with the old-aged brontosaurus that is Java Enterprise?
